Plot: An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.
Title: Nebraska
Actors: Bruce Dern, Will Forte, June Squibb, Bob Odenkirk
tomatoConsensus: Elegant in its simplicity and poetic in its message, Nebraska adds another stirringly resonant chapter to Alexander Payne's remarkable filmography.
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 26 wins & 157 nominations.
